empty-field: Warns the user that they are yet to fill in a field.
complete-your-profile: Encourages the user to complete their profile
auth-dialog-content: Warns the user that they will be redirected to the unified login feature of the Meta-Wiki.
auth-dialog-button-close: Allows the user to close the tab
navbar-link-organizations: Link to the second section of the landing page, which provides information about the CapX project
navbar-link-saved-profiles: Link to the list of saved profiles
navbar-link-profiles: Link to the list of user's profiles
navbar-link-capacities: Link to the capacities page on navigation bar
navbar-link-events: Link to the events page on navigation bar
navbar-link-dark-mode: Toggle between dark and light mode
body-home-section01-title-text: Text displayed on the first section of the home page. Refers to the purpose of the platform, as a space for exchanging...(blank).
body-home-section01-title-template: Parameterized template for the animated title on the first section of the home page. Must contain the placeholder $1 where the rotating word(s) from the carousel will be inserted. Translators can reorder words around $1 to follow their language's grammar.
body-home-section01-title-carousel: Comma-separated list of short words used by the typewriter animation and inserted into $1 of the template. Keep them concise (e.g., nouns) and separated by commas. Example: 'capacity, knowledge, skills, services'.
body-home-section01-description: Text displayed on the first section of the home page. Describes the purpose of the platform, inviting users to connect, learn, and share capacities.
body-home-section01-button: Button displayed on the first section of the home page. Invites users to join the platform.
body-home-section01-about-button: Link to the second section of the landing page, which provides information about the CapX project
body-home-main-section-carrousel-descrip: Text to be displayed beside the Wikimedia projects logos on the landing page
body-home-section01-call-to-action-title: Title text to be displayed at the second section of the landing page
body-home-section01-call-to-action-descr: Text to be displayed at the second section of the landing page, right below the previous title text
body-home-section01-call-to-action-butto: Button displayed on the first section of the home page. Invites users to join the platform.
Link to the Meta-Wiki account creation page
body-home-video-section-title: Title text to be displayed at the end of the first section of the landing page
body-home-feature-section-capacity: Text to be displayed below the Wikimedia projects logos
body-home-feature-section-connect: Text to be displayed below the Wikimedia projects logos
body-home-feature-section-knowledge: Text to be displayed below the Wikimedia projects logos
body-loggedin-home-main-section-title: Title text at the top of the home page body
body-loggedin-home-main-section-descript: Text below title text at the top of the home page body
body-loggedin-home-main-section-button02: Link to the user's profile on navigation bar
body-loggedin-home-third-section-title: Section title for the "Suggestions and Feedback" feature on the home page body
body-loggedin-home-third-section-button: Button text for the "Suggestions and Feedback" feature; it'll copy the email 'capx@wmnobrasil.org' to the user's clipboard
body-loggedin-home-third-section-button-: Snackbar informing user that the e-mail has been successfully copied to clipboard
body-profile-birthday-title: Where user will inform their wiki birthday
body-profile-box-title-wikidata-item: Where user will inform their Wikidata item to be linked
body-profile-box-title-alt-wiki-acc: Where user will select their alternative accounts (if they have one)
body-profile-section-title-territory: Where user will select their territory
body-profile-section-title-affiliation: Where user will select their affiliation
body-profile-section-affiliation-dropdow: Instructs user to select their organization
profiency-level-not-proficient: Allows user to signalize that they are not proficient in the selected language.
profiency-level-basic: Allows user to signalize that they have basic knowledge of the selected language.
profiency-level-intermediate: Allows user to signalize that they have intermediate knowledge of the selected language.
profiency-level-advanced: Allows user to signalize that they have advanced knowledge of the selected language.
profiency-level-almost-native: Allows user to signalize that they are almost native in the selected language.
profiency-level-professional: Allows user to signalize that they have professional proficiency in the selected language.
profiency-level-native: Allows user to signalize that they are native in the selected language.
organization-profile-event-url-title: Title text for the URL field
organization-profile-event-organized-by: Title text for the 'Organized by' field
organization-profile-event-start-date: Title text for the event start time field
organization-profile-event-end-date: Title text for the event end time field
organization-profile-event-format: Title text for the event format field
body-profile-edit-user-button: Allows user to edit their own profile
body-profile-section-title-wanted-capaci: Section title text for Wanted capacities
body-profile-section-title-known-capacit: Section title text for Known capacities
body-profile-section-title-available-cap: Section title text for Available capacities
body-profile-section-title-contact: Section title text for the Contact options
footer-link-documentation: Link to the documentation page in the footer
footer-link-github:
{{Optional}}
Link to the GitHub repository in the footer
footer-link-wikimedia: Link to the Meta-Wikimedia page in the footer
footter-translate-link: Link to the translatewiki.net page for Capacity Exchange in the footer
body-profile-known-capacities-title: Section title text for Known capacities
body-profile-available-capacities-title: Where user will list their available capacities
body-profile-wanted-capacities-title: Where user will list their wanted capacities
body-profile-wikimedia-projects-title: Where user will list the Wikimedia projects they contribute to
body-profile-contact-button: Banner text with a link to send the user a message.
body-profile-copy-link: Button text for the "Copy (profile) link" feature on the user profile
body-profile-copy-link-success: Snackbar informing user that the profile link has been successfully copied to clipboard
body-profile-copy-link-error: Snackbar informing user that there was an error copying the profile link to clipboard
edit-profile-welcome: Welcoming text at the top of edit profile page
edit-profile-image-title: Where user will select a profile image
edit-profile-choose-avatar: Where user will select an avatar
edit-profile-consent-wikidata-link: Preceded by {{msg-wm|Capex-edit-profile-consent-wikidata-before-link}} or {{msg-wm|Capex-edit-profile-consent-wikidata-item-before-link}}. Followed by {{msg-wm|Capex-edit-profile-consent-wikidata-after-link}} or {{msg-wm|Capex-edit-profile-consent-wikidata-item-after-link}}.
edit-profile-save: Allows user to save edits to profile
edit-profile-cancel: Allows user to cancel edits to profile
edit-profile-mini-bio: Where user will write their short bios
edit-profile-mini-bio-tooltip: Further explains field purpose, including guiding questions for possible expected information
edit-profile-select-skills: Instructs user to select skills they have from a pre-set directory.
edit-profile-add-capacities: Action button to add the capacities
edit-profile-available-capacities: Instructs user to select skills that are available to share from the ones they listed in the "known capacities" field.
edit-profile-wanted-capacities: Instructs user to select skills that they are willing to learn from a pre-set directory.
edit-profile-language-tooltip: Instructs user to select the languages they are capable of contributing.
edit-profile-add-language: Allows user to add a language
edit-profile-main-projects: Section title text for the main projects
edit-profile-add-projects: Allows user to add the projects that they contribute to
edit-profile-add-events: Allows user to add the events that they contribute to
edit-profile-display-events: Allows user to display main events of their organization
edit-profile-share-username: Allows user to share other Wikimedia usernames they may have
edit-profile-territory: Allows user to state their geographic location
edit-profile-display-links: Allows user to display links of their organization's activities
edit-profile-wikidata-item: Allows user to use their Wikidata item image
edit-profile-delete-profile-confirm: Allows user to confirm profile deletion
edit-profile-delete-profile-cancel: Allows user to cancel profile deletion
capacity-card-explore-capacity: Allows user to explore a specfic capacity
capacity-card-expand-capacity: Allows user to expand capacity and check its details
capacity-card-info: Allows user to see information about the capacity
capacity-search-placeholder: Placeholder explaining capacity search bar purpose
capacity-banner-title: Banner text for the "Capacity Directory" page
capacity-selection-modal-select-capacity: Allows user to select a capacity from the list
capacity-selection-modal-no-capacities-f: Informs user that no capacities have been found for that particular category
capacity-selection-modal-see-more-inform: Allows user to see more information
capacity-selection-modal-hover-view-capa: Allows user to see the capacity in the Capacity Feed page
capacity-selection-modal-select-capacity: Allows user to select a capacity from the list
capacity-selection-modal-loading: Text to be displayed while capacities of a category load
events-filters-applied: Text displayed when filters are applied; it'll be followed by a list of filters that the user has selected
feed-no-data-message: Informs user that no data has been found for the selected filters
feed-no-data-description: Encourages user to use different filters or return later
edit-profile-organization-logo-help: Instructs user on how to edit organization logo
edit-profile-no-image: Informs user that no image is currently selected
organization-profile-event-popup-close-o: A “modal” is a modal dialog box, which is a window that stops the user from clicking anything outside it before it is closed.
events-search-placeholder: Placeholder text for the event search box
events-available-capacities: Title text of section where available capacities will be displayed
events-search-results: Text displayed when a search is requested; it'll be followed by the number of results found (even if none are found)
events-search-results-singular: Text displayed when one event is found; it'll follow the number of results found
events-search-results-plural: Text displayed when any number (except for 1) of events is found; it'll follow the number of results found
events-search-results-no-results: Text to be displayed in case no events are found.
events-no-results-with-filters: Text to be displayed in case no events match the selected filters, with an encouragement for the user to remove some filters.
events-search-results-error: Text to be displayed if an error occurs. Encourages user to try again.
body-profile-badges-no-badges: Descriptive text stating that the user has no active badges yet
body-profile-badges-title: Section title text for the 'Badges' section in the user profile page
aria-language-input: Allows user to select a language
